ItemConsumable.name: Meek
ItemConsumable.description: This vial of liquid is remarkably unthreatening. It's labelled as a biological refactoring agent that will render your metabolism better specialized to derive nutrition from non-live sources. "The meek will inherit the urth," it says on the tagline.
ItemConsumable.effectmodifier: You can feel the substance seep into your every pore and coursing through you, rewriting your digestive and other metabolic processes. Your karma score is now VALUE and cooked food sounds a bit more appetizing.
